jdbcService.sql: select u.id, u.created, u.modified, u.secret, u.password, u.salt, u.password_modified, u.secret_modified, u.alias, u.verification_code, u.invites_left, u.blocked_since, u.anonymous, u.realm from users u join nodes n on u.id = n.id where u.alias = :alias and u.realm = :realm and n.enabled = true and n.verified is not null and n.published is not null
